short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check merge button on GitHub by label

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight GitHub Merge Buttons Based on PR Page's Label

Merge buttons that differ from the specified GitHub label are highlighted to prevent the selection of an incorrect merge method.

The following labels can be used:

- squash-and-merge
- create-a-merge-commit
- rebase-and-merge
